name: SUBPLANES
description:
This is a game I created when I was younger and learning how to develop games. I found this file while I was cleaning up my computer. sadly I couldn't find the development files so I can't update this game any further, or fix the bad and possibly offensive jokes younger me made while developing this game. The screenshots are from the premium version.

>pilot a plane and fight unique enemies!

>No sound!

>over 10 unique enemies!

>a bossfight!

the premium version inclues:

>four planes to choose from!

>an additional boss!

arrow keys to move. B to use the plane's special ability. The guide in 1.0.8 and the tutorial is not translated to english as I lost the development files.
